name: Spookland
description:
Spookland.

Welcome to Spookland. This is a 2D Top Down Shooter game with a little bit of spookiness involved :) Try it out yourself and see if you can beat all the enemies and fight the final Boss!

Important: For a better experience you might want to run this game on a full-screen mode (See the bottom right corner).

I would appreciate any feedbacks! Enjoy the game!

To download the game and see the source code, please visit my Github account: Spookland and follow the instructions in Readme file.
